reviewText:
Kids and adults will enjoy this program - like what you'd see on PBS.  It follows Howler monkey Ruby, her sanctuary rehabilitation, and the nursing back to health of young manatees, also in the sanctuary.  In addition, you'll see a family of otters living nearby in the river.

I could have done without the narrator's sometimes silly "pretend" voicing of some of the animals thoughts, but this was a minor complaint.  I learned a lot and enjoyed the DVD.  I also have a lot of respect for the sanctuary volunteers and got to watch as they explained exactly how they help heal their charges (very interesting).
